communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Lecture tone; pseudo-scientific framing; frame women as objects with market value.

narratives.c_essay: The dating market is a numbers game, and men need to understand their value to succeed. Women are hypergamous, and they will always choose the highest status male available. Men need to focus on self-improvement and building their value if they want to attract high-quality women.
narratives.p_intro: Hello, I'm Nathan_king, and I'm here to educate you on the harsh realities of the dating market. My expertise is based on years of research and personal experience, and I'm not afraid to tell you the truth, no matter how brutal it may be.
